thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 2 of 186
thread.title: Amy
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: I live in NY, but my sister and 9yo niece live in NC, I wanted to find something different to send them for their birthdays, both of their birthdays are in March. When I found the Bake a Wish website I thought - what a cool idea, send a birthday cake, and of course I knew my niece would be thrilled! After ordering the chocolate cake and sending it, before it got there I had images of a blob of chocolate arriving, I hadn't given thought to maybe cakes don't ship well. Totally not the case, my sister said there was SO much care given in how it was wrapped and securely packaged, she said as soon as they opened it the smell was HEAVENLY!!!! They said it was one of the best cakes they've ever had, so needless to say I will definitely be ordering from them again!
